h1.strong: Below are district updates in regard to the Bellevue CSD and the impact and actions as a result of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) - The most recent are at the top of the list.

a.strong: School Closure Update Letter (Student Materials, Graduation, etc.) - April 21, 2020
Weekly Comet - School Closure Update for the 2019-2020 School Year - April 24, 2020
Bellevue Community School District “Continuous Learning Plan” Information and FAQ’s
Weekly Comet - School Closure Update - April 3, 2020
School Closure Extension Letter - April 2, 2020
NEW Food Service Program Offering during the Coronavirus COVID-19 Pandemi

a.strong: April 29 - “Emotional Intelligence (Part 3) - Later Childhood”
April 28 - “Emotional Intelligence (Part 2) - Early Childhood”
April 27 - “Emotional Intelligence”
April 24 - “Chronic Grief”
April 23 - “A New Name for a New Normal”

April 17 - Coping Tips - Natalie Torres (English Teacher at the Bellevue CSD)
April 16 - Coping Tips - “Everyone has a story and Nobody wants to….”
April 15 - Coping Tips: “Keep Short Accounts”
April 14 - Interview with Dr. Ruby Payne -
April 13 - “Grateful and Hopeful”
Bellevue Interview - April 10 - Former Bellevue CSD Teacher Leah Whetsell (Perspectives in Arizona)
Bellevue Interview - April 9 - Superintendent Tom Meyer (Leading in COVID-19)
Bellevue Interview - April 8 - Stacie Huling & Taylor Dewitt (Parenting in COVID-19)
Bellevue Interview - April 7 - Rick & Wendy Casel (Parenting in COVID-19)
Bellevue Interview - April 6 - Bailey Van Zuiden (January Graduate)

althy Grief - March 20
